channel.title: SMLR on The Chief's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in SMLR on The Chief's Blog

item.title: Semler Scientific
item.description: The bull argument Last week, I listened to an interview of Yen Liow on The Equity Mates podcast. What a fascinating character, the passion for finding and investing in great companies exudes out of him. Here’s the interview if you’re interested: He was generous enough to pitch two stocks during the interview, one of them being Semler Scientific $SMLR. Semler Scientific owns a product called QuantaFlo, which is a cloud-supported easy-to-use PAD test kit that delivers fast and accurate results in less than 5-minutes at the point-of-care.
